subject: You have my money, where is the rest of my order?
description_text: It has been a week and no one has responded from Simsonn. This is terrible customer service. I am going to contact my card company and dispute the charges.

conversations.body_text: Hi John,    Alright, thank you for your reply.

Hello SIMSONN,
  I have not received all of my order. I am still waiting for a response.
Can someone please update me regarding my order. Thank you, John

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 5:16 PM service @simsonn.com
No one has responded. Can someone tell me where my order is?

This ticket is a week now and nobody has reached out to me to explain where
my order is!

You took my money. Where is my order?
Tickets with IDs 9827, 10259, and 10260 have been merged into this ticket.

Thank you, 
                                  John

Hi John,  We’re very sorry for the delayed reply. Due to the peak season and the New Year holidays, we had a large backlog of emails and orders, which caused delays in processing. In addition, our VAM Pro supplier has had a delay in some components, which has affected production. We will ship your order as soon as possible. The shipment will include 3× VAM Pro and 3× motor brackets. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Hi John,      Sorry for the delayed response. Here's your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks—it's just incredibly popular. Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive on the 22nd.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224807280

Hello,
  thank you for contacting and updating  me on the status of my order. I
can appreciate how busy you are after the holidays. I look forward to
trying the haptics for the pedals. Thanks, John

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 6:18 PM service @simsonn.com
Hi John,    Thank you for your understanding. Have fun!
